topComments.author: Danielle McClellan

topComments.author: Santi
topComments.comment: Megan was an exceptional tour guide and was very knowledgeable about the animals in the enclosures. The entire experience was wonderful, and they clearly show great care for all of their animals. Definitely check this place out if you want to meet adorable animals, especially capybaras!  highly recommend, will visit again!

topComments.author: Pedro Loperena
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Deixe-me come√ßar dizendo que a experi√™ncia que tivemos n√£o foi nada do que esper√°vamos. Trouxe minha esposa aqui para o anivers√°rio dela e quando nos aproximamos do endere√ßo, vemos uma casa e nos perguntamos se est√°vamos no local errado. N√≥s n√£o est√°vamos. Conhecemos Kylie e ela nos guia at√© os fundos da propriedade onde est√£o os animais. Ao entrar na √°rea, foi tudo uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel a partir da√≠. Todos os animais que vimos neste local foram obviamente cuidados, amados como se fossem realmente parte da fam√≠lia. Todos eles tinham recintos limpos que tinham espa√ßo mais do que suficiente para viver e vagar. Eles brincam, ficam em mais de uma cama ou √°reas de cochilo. Eles t√™m brinquedos e equipamentos para mant√™-los ocupados e ter uma vida enriquecida. Kylie foi √≥tima em dar o passeio. Ela tem grandes detalhes sobre cada animal. N√£o √© o tipo de informa√ß√£o que voc√™ busca no Google. S√£o informa√ß√µes detalhadas e atualizadas sobre cada animal individual, desde antes do dia em que chegaram at√© os dias atuais. Kylie foi muito gentil e acolhedora, ela garantiu que tiv√©ssemos tempo suficiente para aproveitar cada animal e participar com eles. Tamb√©m conhecemos o Brian e voc√™ pode ver o envolvimento sincero que cada um tem com o bem estar dos animais. Eles n√£o cortam cantos quando se trata de conforto de seus animais. Tivemos um tempo incr√≠vel e at√© compramos algumas lembran√ßas. Este √© um lugar que espero visitar novamente. Eu recomendo este lugar para quem quer uma experi√™ncia animal real e genu√≠na que tamb√©m ajude o futuro desses animais. Amazing Animals definitivamente atendeu √†s minhas expectativas 100% e al√©m.  (Original) Let me begin by saying that the experience that we had was nothing that we expected. I brought my Wife here for her Birthday and when we approached the address, we see a house and wondered if we were in the wrong location. We weren't. We meet Kylie and she guides us to the back of the property where the animals are at. Upon entering the area it was all an amazing experience from that on that on. Every animal we saw at this location was obviously cared for, loved as if they were actually part of the family. They all had clean enclosures that had more than enough space to live and roam. They play, hang out in more than one bed or napping areas. They have toys and equipment to keep them busy and have a enriched life. Kylie was great in giving the tour. She has great details about each animal. Not the kind of information that you Google. This is detailed up to date information about each individual animal, from before the day they arrived until the present day. Kylie was very kind and welcoming, she made sure that we had enough time to enjoy each animal and participate with them. We also met Brian and you can see the sincere involvement they each have with the animals well being. They don't cut corners when it comes to their animals comfort. We had a incredible time and even bought some souvenirs. This is a place that I look forward to visiting again. I recommend this place to anyone that wants a real, genuine Animal experience that helps the future of these animals as well. Amazing Animals definitely met my expectations 100% and beyond.

topComments.author: Mel anie

Se voc√™ √© um amante dos animais e, mais importante, algu√©m que aprecia educa√ß√£o e conserva√ß√£o, ent√£o este √© o lugar para voc√™!  Imagine um tour privado por sua impressionante cole√ß√£o de animais. Nossa guia era muito experiente e ela compartilhou muitas informa√ß√µes sobre cada animal e sua exibi√ß√£o. topComments.author: Mackinzie Kraft
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O passeio da Amazing Animals Inc. vale muito o pre√ßo. N√£o tivemos problemas para reservar nosso tour privado (eles pedem que voc√™ pague pelo menos a entrada de 1 h√≥spede para manter o lugar) e nos divertimos muito. Essas pessoas t√™m muito conhecimento sobre seus animais e fornecem um passeio muito informativo que promove a conserva√ß√£o dos animais. Eu posso realmente dizer que eles cuidam de seus animais e continuam a conserva√ß√£o dessas esp√©cies selvagens. Voc√™ pode acariciar capivaras e animais de curral, como cabras e burros. No geral, uma experi√™ncia incr√≠vel  (Original) Amazing Animals Inc.'s tour is very worth the price. We had no issues booking our private tour (they ask that you at least pay for 1 guest's entry to hold the spot) and we had lots of fun. These people have lots of knowledge on their animals and provide a very informational-based tour that promotes animal conservation. I can really tell that they care for their animals and continuing the conservation of these wild species. You are able to pet capybara and barnyard animals like goats and donkies. Overall an awesome experience

topComments.author: Lynn Grimley
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uma das melhores experi√™ncias da minha vida! Este tour pessoal √© fenomenal! Nossa fam√≠lia viu e interagiu com tantos animais √∫nicos e divertidos, e nosso fabuloso anfitri√£o foi incrivelmente informativo e nos ensinou muitas coisas sobre conserva√ß√£o e vida selvagem. Por favor, considere fazer disso um must-do se voc√™ deseja uma experi√™ncia de sua vida!  (Original) One of the best experiences of my life! This personal tour is phenomenal! Our family saw and interacted with so many unique and entertaining animals, and our fabulous host was incredibly informative and taught us many things about conservation and wild life. Please consider making this a must-do if you want an experience of a lifetime!

topComments.author: Jamie Kernc
topComments.comment: 5 Stars!!! Our tour just concluded, and we had an absolutely amazing time!! We were given so much wonderful information about each animal, and had such positive interactions with the animal ambassadors. We were lucky enough to schedule for a noon tour, close to feeding time. The enclosures were clean, with lots of enrichment items to interact with. I had no idea that melanistic Geoffroy‚Äôs cats were a thing! I was super excited to hear more about them, and purchased the conservation kit at the end of our tour.  On a different note: Oh. My. Sloth. How wonderful it was to be able to closely interact with the sloths as they enjoyed their corn snack!! We were watching them eat, had the opportunity to stroke their backs, and as they were finishing up, we stepped back. We loved watching them drop their cobs on the floor!  We loved our tour with its message of conservation, and encourage anyone to schedule a tour for themselves!

topComments.author: aviva
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) este √© um lugar incr√≠vel para os amantes dos animais! todos os animais s√£o claramente tratados muito bem, especialmente porque muitos s√£o resgatados ou ex-animais de estima√ß√£o que foram dispensados. as capivaras especialmente s√£o extremamente ador√°veis, e eu realmente gostei do meu tempo no santu√°rio. Megan especificamente foi um guia tur√≠stico incr√≠vel e divertido, e tornou o passeio ainda mais agrad√°vel :) recomendo  (Original) this is an amazing place for animal lovers! all the animals are clearly treated really well, especially as many are rescues or ex-pets that were let go of. the capybaras especially are extremely adorable, and i truly enjoyed my time at the sanctuary. megan specifically was an incredible and fun tour guide, and made the tour even more enjoyable :) highly recommend
